div.div:
Robb - November 8, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2.1
Good stuff
Works great on Droid x Works on all roms that I've flashed. A god send for use with spb shell, launcher7, and blur roms using adw. J, PLZ ADD MORE

Don - January 15, 2012 - Version 1.2.1
Huh??!!
Does not work on rooted HTC Aria with CM 7.1 You give no contact info regarding your suggestion to "email you with problems." p.s - Had to re-download, now it's forcing close. Kind of a worthless app, I'd say. How to get a refund??!! UNINSTALLED!! (and it will not fully uninstall!) Obviously needs more work.

David - November 23, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.2.1
Great!
Awesome animations. Would like to see ICS added but it seems this app has been abandoned.

Kevin - December 23, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2.1
Excellent app!
I have a droid x, rooted, running cyanogen mod 7 and this app works exactly as it should. Very pleased :)

Frank - August 22, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.2.1
Good!,
If you using cm7 and receiving error try aply various times. Work perfect on Miui.

matt - July 27, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.2.1
Nice upgrade on animations... Don't know what that other g2x user was having ...
Nice upgrade on animations... Don't know what that other g2x user was having problems with im rockin ultimate rom with faux kernel

Will - September 9, 2011 - HTC Desire S with version 1.2.1
Not for everyone
No good for Sense 3.0 roms. Boot loop city. The problem is, by the time you've done a battery pull, booted into recovery, restored a backup, and got back onto the market, it's too late to request a refund. :(

PeAnUt HeAd - November 10, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2.1
-__-
Continues to FC on my EVO definitely know I'm rooted so there is no excuse. . . Refunded. The HACKED version worked better :-\

Kurt - June 28, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.2.1
Love it
I have romtoolbox pro from JRummy as well, both are great and well worth the cash. This app really makes your phone stand out.

Will - September 1, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2.1
Works great
Works without any problems. Dx with prerooted gb. (Some of the animations are really cool)

Eddie - November 28, 2011 - Galaxy Prevail with version 1.2.1
Not Bad
This wansnt bad on my samsung prevail, but the animation options just arent that diffrent. after trying them all there was really only 1 that i liked. Unfortunatly i think i missed the 15min window to get a refund. Again, not bad....just not amazing.

michael - October 27, 2011 - Samsung VinsQ(M910) with version 1.2.1
Samsung Intercept
Great app. I've never had a single problem. Could use more animations but otherwise awesome.

Mike - June 24, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.2.1
Awesome!!! Just what I need to finish customizing my phone. Og Droid with liquid ...
Awesome!!! Just what I need to finish customizing my phone. Og Droid with liquid x.

The animation in this application is worth the money. I was hesitant at first, ...
The animation in this application is worth the money. I was hesitant at first, but very satisfied on the performance of the animation. Sgs4G

GSIIx (paradox rom& synergy kernel)
Works for me, but makes market crash as soon as you set a animation. Could be due to a few things.

Z - September 15, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.1
Working flawless in my galaxy s2.. If its not working for you take a ...
Working flawless in my galaxy s2.. If its not working for you take a look at your system & apps settings!

Douglas - August 22, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2.1
Strange. It worked 1st time I used it. Changed rom, then went back to ...
Strange. It worked 1st time I used it. Changed rom, then went back to the rom it worked on an it caused a boot loop. Please make this more reliable!!!

Rafael - June 26, 2012 - Version 1.2.1
Sucks.
Bricked rooted Samsung infuse 4g with froyo. Would really like for this to work. Seen it on a friends phone and looks fabulous. update...tried again a year later on a Motorola Triumph rooted with cm7, and still experiencing problems. Really wish I would have never purchased this app. Only 1 or 2 of the animations worked, and the random option, made wallpaper changing impossible. Uninstalling and never trying again. Refund would be nice, but you live and you learn lol

Skrapi - June 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2.1
Used to work perfect. Now FC when I hit the reboot n puts my ...
Used to work perfect. Now FC when I hit the reboot n puts my phone in reboot loop. Please fix. Galaxy S I9000.

Slim - May 30, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.2.1
I wish there was a iq test before you could download or rate a ...
I wish there was a iq test before you could download or rate a app. Droidx liberty rom 2.0 works great

Harley - June 22, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.2.1
Very useful for putting a Samsung Fascinate into a boot loop.

Chuck - April 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.2.1
Boot loop
After shutdown, battery pull and reflashing Rom the 15 min window is gone....have play store open on a computer in case u need to refund

PaulM - May 27, 2012 - Version 1.2.1
Jeez
This is pretty cool, however, it seems that the animations it displays are random, even without that option selected. I originally downloaded as a means to have an animation when switching apps using GMD's gesture control app, but the animations work a slim percentage of the time when switching apps through that means... really a very good app otherwise, very cool animations, and, as far as I can tell the only app that allows us to change these.

Tyler - March 28, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.2.1
Works with ICS too! :)
Prefer FlyIn over stock ICS animations and worked perfect.. Wish we could add some more animations, like stock clock fold in and out? -Nexus S 4.0.4

works like it supposed to
all but blur worked on cm7 atrix. would be great to get some updated anims...ICS?

.

Not 100% but doesn't need to be
